ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
"Ghouls Gone Wild/ Hawaiian Holiday!" Part 1 of 2
After receiving unexpected check from the IRS, Jon takes Tarot and her Family from cold Salem to sunny Hawaii. There, with ring in hand, he plans to pop the big question to Tarot! But what Jon thought was a protective paradise, soon turns into an Island of Terror!
*Notes:* The main cover is a homage of the Coppertone sun tan lotion advertisements.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 22:26:37. [CVDB121772]
